title: Tinjau Posko Terpadu Lanud Sultan Iskandar Muda, Pemerintah Pastikan Arus Logistik Bantuan Terus Mengalir
title_en: Inspecting Integrated Command Post at Sultan Iskandar Muda Air Base, Government Ensures Continuous Aid Logistics Flow
content:
Menteri Koordinator Bidang Pembangunan Manusia dan Kebudayaan (Menko PMK), Pratikno, meninjau Posko Terpadu penanganan bencana alam Aceh di Lanud Sultan Iskandar Muda. Tempat ini difungsikan sebagai gudang logistik utama sebelum bantuan didistribusikan ke wilayah terdampak. Kunjungan ini memastikan kesiapan stok dan kelancaran rantai pasok bantuan kemanusiaan.

Sesuai arahan Bapak Presiden, bantuan tambahan akan terus dikirimkan dan berbagai langkah pemulihan akan dipercepat untuk memastikan masyarakat mendapatkan penanganan yang layak dan segera keluar dari masa tanggap darurat.
content_en:
Coordinating Minister for Human Development and Culture (Menko PMK), Pratikno, inspected the Integrated Command Post for Aceh natural disaster response at Sultan Iskandar Muda Air Base. This location functions as the main logistics warehouse before aid is distributed to affected areas. This visit ensured stock readiness and smooth humanitarian aid supply chain.

As directed by the President, additional aid will continue to be sent and various recovery measures will be accelerated to ensure the community receives proper treatment and soon exits the emergency response period.
